product_name: REI Minor Wound Care Refill Kit
long_description: Use the REI Minor Would Care Refill Kit to replenish the essential first-aid items needed to properly care for minor abrasions, cuts or stings. REI Minor Would Care Refill Kit includes adhesive bandages that cover multiple sizes, and it includes a knuckle and fingertip bandage. 2 x 2 in.gauze pads clean and protect wounds. 2 in. wide gauze roll can be used to add pressure and absorb fluids during wound dressing; gauze roll is 4.1 yards long. Antiseptic towelettes cleanse wounds and triple antibiotic ointment helps keep them clean. Also includes sting relief wipes.
short_description: Use the REI Minor Would Care Refill Kit to replenish the essential first-aid items needed to properly care for minor abrasions, cuts or stings.
